active-version-info.description: The boldStart and boldEnd parts will be replaced with html tags
active-version-info.message: You are now running {boldStart} version $addonVer$ {boldEnd} on Thunderbird $appVer$.

addon-authors-struggle.message: To continue to be useful, Add-on developers now need to fund the resources needed to fix and rewrite so that our users can keep benefiting from the functionality we bring to the table.

btn-extend-license.message: I want to extend my license by one year

btn-renew-license.message: I want to renew my license

btn-want-to-donate.message: I want to help with a one time donation.

buyDomainLicense.instruct.message: Need Licenses for a company with more than five users? Getting a domain license will work out cheaper:

buyLicense.instruct.message: Need a license for yourself? Get a single user license. It is bound to your personal Email address and can be used in multiple installations.

buyStandardLicense.instruct.message: Can't afford the premium functions? Get a highly affordable standard license and keep testing premium functions.

chkHideFromQuickJump.tooltip.message: Omit this folder and its children in quickJump / quickMove results

chkIgnoreCounts.tooltip.message: Never display number of contained mails.

chkIgnoreUnread.tooltip.message: Never display bold or any unread count even when folder contains unread mail.

chkSetMailsUnread.tooltip.message: If you move mail into this folder it is set to unread.

cost-of-independence.message: Software development costs time and money - unlike many platform apps, Add-ons are not written by large corporations, nor are they sponsored in any way by Mozilla.

cssBackground.tooltip.message: Enter a CSS background, e.g. linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(254,252,234,1) 0%,rgba(241,218,54,1) 100%)

cssColor.tooltip.message: Enter a CSS color, e.g. rgba(100,20,20,0.8)

domainLicense.email.message: We will contact you using this email address to generate your domain license; please allow two business days for us to get in touch. Enter the domain name for the license on the next page.

domainLicense.instruct.message: The license is keyed to your company domain. The license will allow users with email addresses ending on this email domain to use QuickFolders Pro. E.g. if you enter the domain name 'abc.com' then mail users like fred@abc.com, martha@abc.com, mike.doe@abc.com etc. are allowed to use the license. The maximum number of valid individual users is the number you have entered on the initial screen.

domainLicense.validate.message: Make sure you enter the domain name *exactly as it is* on your Company's email addresses (the part *after* the @ sign), as it will be used to authorize the email addresses of your users.

donate.message: Help out with a one time donation.

enterLicenseKey.tooltip.message: Enter the License Key code sent to you via Email.

extend-your-license.message: Consider extending your license by a year.

extensionDescription.message: Bookmark your favorite mail folders in Thunderbird.

extensions.quickfolders@curious.be.descr.message: Bookmark your favorite mail folders in Thunderbird.

freeLicense.message: If you have recently donated to the QuickFolders project or have done contributory work, such as translating or writing patches, you may be eligible for a free license key. Contact me from the support tab in QuickFolders Options.

heading-installed.description: page heading. first placeholder will be replaced with Add-on name

heading-updated.description: page heading. first placeholder will be replaced with Add-on name

intro.message: An annual license for QuickFolders Pro gives you all premium features for a year. It also enables us to support and grow the product further and turn it into something even more awesome.

license-is-extended.description: Shown if license expires more than a year from now
license-is-extended.message: Thank you for recently extending your license or if you have donated. As you have helped to future proof this Add-on, you can simply close this window.

licenseComparison.message: To compare the features of the different versions, {linkStart}read this list{linkEnd}.

licenseTypes.message: QuickFolders offers two licenses, Standard and Pro; these are necessary to keep up with the changes in the Thunderbird platform and to finance Innovations and repairs of the Add-on. Because changes that potentially break extension functionality are rolled out annually, the license will also be valid for 1 year.

license_restriced.std.message: Standard License - restricted Pro function. Find out more…

license_restriced.unpaid.message: Unlicensed version - restricted function. Find out more…

license_restriced.standard.maxtabs.message: QuickFolders needs a Pro license to support more than $maxTabs$ tabs.

license_restriced.unpaid.maxtabs.message: QuickFolders needs a license to support more than $maxTabs$ tabs.

mozillas-basic-platform.message: Mozilla only provides a basic platform for delivering our software to you, the end users. If we need to ask our users for payment or support we cannot do this from addons.thunderbird.net - it is not an 'app store' with built in paywalls or license management like iTunes or google play.

ongoing-work.message: The alterations to convert $addonName$ to the new programming model took weeks and were costly. There are many more changes for the next 2022 version. With a complex Add-on like this, expensive work becomes inevitable. Please help us with this.

qf.alert.pasteFolders.formatErr.message: Could not create tabs. See tools / error console for more detail.

qf.button.reorderButtonBottom.toolTip.message: Rearrange filter so it executes after all others

qf.button.reorderButtonTop.toolTip.message: Rearrange filter so it executes before all others

qf.categories.supportMultiple.tooltip.message: Use the SHIFT key in order to select more than one category on the dropdown.

qf.checkbox.autoFocusPreview.message: Focus on message list when changing tabs

qf.checkbox.hideInSingleMessage.message: Hide QuickFolders in single message tabs

qf.checkbox.hideInSingleMessage.tooltip.message: Removes the QuickFolders toolbar in tabs that show a single message.

qf.checkbox.debug.tooltip.message: Right click this checkbox for advanced debug options

qf.checkbox.displaylabel.message: Display the 'QuickFolders' label in the toolbar

qf.checkbox.displaylabel.tooltip.message: Right click to change the text of this label

qf.checkbox.enableTransitions.tooltip.message: Shows smooth transitions between several aspects of tab coloring.

qf.checkbox.hideCategoryBox.tooltip.message: Minimizes the Categories menu to take up less space.

qf.checkbox.quickCopy.message: quickCopy - Copy mail to any folder with Shortcut:

qf.checkbox.quickCopy.tip.message: Shortcut for dragging mails to the quickCopy button for fastest copying to any folder via name entry.

qf.checkbox.quickJump.message: quickJump - Go to any folder with Shortcut:

qf.checkbox.quickJump.tip.message: Shortcut for clicking the quickJump button for fastest navigation anywhere via name entry.

qf.checkbox.quickMove.message: quickMove - Move mail to any folder with Shortcut:

qf.checkbox.quickMove.tip.message: Shortcut for dragging mails to the quickMove button for fastest filing to any folder via name entry.

qf.checkbox.quickmove.autofill.tip.message: The last folder successfully used will be inserted. Hit Enter to use it, or simply type over it for other destinations.

qf.checkbox.readingList.tooltip.message: A list for mails that should be read later. Drag your important emails on this button.

qf.checkbox.showCountInSubFolders.toolti.message: These are displayed separated by a '+' beside their main counts; contained unread mail will also make tab bold if option above is active

qf.checkbox.showFilterButton.tooltip.message: You can also create Filters using the QuickFolders context menu.

qf.checkbox.showIcons.message: Display Icons (Inbox, Sent, Junk, Trash, Drafts, Archived, Templates)

qf.checkbox.showNewMailItalics.message: Display tabs with newly arrived mail italic

qf.checkbox.showNonEmptyItalics.message: Display tabs which contain messages italic

qf.checkbox.showQuickMove.tooltip.message: The quickMove button can be used to drag emails to a named destination folder. You can gather mails from multiple folders. Once you have the desired mails in it, enter the destination folder name in the search box.

qf.checkbox.showTotalMessageCount.message: Display the total number of messages

qf.checkbox.showUnreadBold.message: Display tabs with unread messages in bold

qf.checkbox.showUnreadMessageCount.message: Display the number of unread messages

qf.checkbox.showshortcutnumber.message: Display shortcut number on folder labels

qf.checkbox.singleMessage.currentFolder..message: Show current folder toolbar in the window that opens when you select to open an Email in a new window

qf.checkbox.skipFolder.message: Skip Unread Folder - use Shortcut: SHIFT +

qf.checkbox.skipFolder.tip.message: Shortcut for jumping to the next unread folder.

qf.checkbox.sortMenusAlpha.message: Force alphabetic sorting of menus with subfolders.

qf.checkbox.sortMenusAlpha.tooltip.message: Only use this option if your mail client doesn't sort the subfolders correctly.

qf.checkbox.tabMenuIcon.tooltip.message: This menu can also be invoked by right-clicking the toolbar itself

qf.checkbox.useNavigationShortcuts.message: ALT-Left / ALT-Right for previous / next Tab

qf.checkbox.useRebuildShortcut.message: Rebuild Tabs with Shortcut: Ctrl + Alt +

qf.copyfolders.tooltip.message: Copy the QuickFolders Tabs configuration to the clipboard

qf.description.github.message: Please use github for all official feature requests and bug reports

qf.description.categoryusage.message: You can put this tab in a category (i.e. 'Work', 'Private', …).

qf.description.changeCategory.message: Right click a tab to organize it into one or several categories. Creates a filter for categories on the left of the tabs.

qf.description.contactMe.message: You can also contact me personally at $supportMail$:

qf.description.donate.message: If you love QuickFolders as much as we do and would like to support its development, you can donate some money towards the further development of QuickFolders.

qf.description.dragToAdd.message: Drag mail folders onto an empty area of the new toolbar to create a new quickfolder (works like a shortcut/alias). Drag Messages onto quickfolder to move them into the corresponding folder (or Copy with modifier key). Click quickfolder to jump to mail folder.

qf.description.dragToPopup.message: Drag messages onto quickfolder popup menu to move messages into sub folders.

qf.description.dragToPosition.message: Drag quickfolders sideways to change their positions. Right-click quickfolder for context menu; by selecting you can jump into sub folders. 'Rename tab' changes the label of the quickfolder. 'Remove tab' deletes the quickfolder (not the mail folder).

qf.description.dragexplain.message: Tabs can also be dragged to change positions! Drop one on top of another to insert before / after it.

qf.description.editcategory.message: Select an existing category by double clicking on it, or add a new category below.

qf.description.experimentalItems.message: The following items are experimental, they will hopefully be working in the next release!!

qf.description.languages.message: QuickFolders supports localization - you can help by adding a translation in your language on github:

qf.description.linkNote.message: Visit the homepage of QuickFolders for a detailed user guide, Tips and FAQ:

qf.description.multicategory.message: To add a folder to more than one category: Hold down SHIFT or CONTROL while selecting items.

qf.description.pulldown.message: The QuickFolders bar will display a pulldown, allowing you to filter your tabs by category.

qf.description.rightClickOptions.message: Right-click an empty area to open the options menu. In options, you can select native style (smaller) or flat style (clearer; supports drag indicator).

qf.description.tipMsg.message: Tip: If you have an extensive amount of folders, try the Nostalgy extension for keyboard driven message organizing.

qf.dialog.changeorder.message: Change the order of the tabs

qf.dialog.setcategory.message: Set the category for a tab

qf.filters.instructions.message: Please select a template. You can fine tune the filter rules on the next screen.

qf.filters.template.from.description.message: This is probably the most used pattern:  this will retrieve the sender's email address and paste it into the from and to filter conditions fields. This way complete conversations with the sender will be moved to the new folder.

qf.filters.template.list.description.message: Similar to Based on Sender, but it doesn't fill the 'to' condition field.

qf.filters.template.tag.description.message: Uses the tags of the email and adds them as filter conditions.

qf.filters.template.to.description.message: Similar to 'Based on Sender': use this when you mark an email you have sent to somebody else. This will retrieve the recpient's email address and paste it into the from and to filter conditions fields. This way the complete conversation with the contact will be moved to the new folder.

qf.filters.template.topic.description.message: This will look for special expressions in brackets, e.g. [stamp collectors] or {vegans} and create a filter condition based on these; a lot of mass email is set up using this pattern, so it is really easy to use.

qf.filters.toggleMessage.notificationTex.message: Filter Learning mode started. Whenever you move an email into QuickFolders a 'Create Filter Rule' Wizard will start. Thunderbird uses message filters for automatically moving emails based on rules such as 'who is the sender?', 'is a certain keyword in the subject line?'. To end the filter learning mode, press the filter button on the top left of the QuickFolders bar.

qf.goNextUnread.auto.message: Go to next folder without asking (recommended)

qf.goNextUnread.none.message: Do nothing if no unread email is left in folder

qf.goNextUnread.prompt.message: Ask to go to next unread folder

qf.label.ColoredTabPalette.tooltip.message: Palette for tabs with a user-assigned color

qf.label.Toolbar.bottomLine.tip.message: The width of the line under tabs. Change its color with the Active Tab Color picker below.

qf.label.UncoloredTab.tooltip.message: Look of (inactive) tabs without a specifically selected color

qf.label.github.message: Report a bug / Request a feature…

qf.label.dragFolderLabel.message: Drag folders here to create a tab. Click the tab to go to the folder, drag messages to move/copy them there.

qf.label.getQuickFilters.message: For an improved and more powerful way of creating Filters please install my extension quickFilters!

qf.label.goNextUnread.tip.message: Usually Thunderbird asks when you go to next unread mail if it needs to jump to a different folder.

qf.label.homePage.message: Find detailed information at the QuickFolders homepage at quickfolders.org…

qf.label.insertLicense.message: Insert your personal License key here:

qf.label.insertLicense.tooltip.message: Your license key is contained in your order confirmation email from Fastspring.

qf.label.instantApplyMsg.message: Note: if you only see a [Close] button below, the color settings might not work - as workaround, try right-clicking on an empty area of the quickfolders bar to select options… this will force the [Ok] button to be displayed, which should save colors.

qf.label.menus.hideQFunlessCTRL.message: Only display with CTRL key held

qf.licenseValidation.expired.message: The license key you entered is expired. Please press the button below to renew your license.

qf.licenseValidation.failed.message: The license key you entered is not valid. Check your email from FastSpring for instructions. If you still have problems, please contact me from the Support tab.

qf.licenseValidation.invalidAddon.message: The license key you entered may be for a different Add-on. License keys for {0} start with {1}.

qf.licenseValidation.invalidMail.message: The email address that is bound to the license key [{1}] is currently not listed in any of your mail accounts. Please contact me from the Support tab for assistance.

qf.licenseValidation.notMatchedMail.message: Encrypted Email address does not match readable one.

qf.licenseValidation.passed.message: Thanks for registering QuickFolders Pro! All premium features are now unlocked.

qf.licenseValidation.standard.message: Thanks for registering a QuickFolders License - You are helping the Add-on immensely! If you need more features you can always upgrade to the Pro License.

qf.menuitem.quickfolders.changeOrder.message: Change the order of the tabs

qf.notification.dontShowAgain.message: Do not show this message again.

qf.notification.premium.btn.extendLicens.message: This will extend the current license date by 1 year. It's typically cheaper than a new license.

qf.notification.premium.readingList.message: You have now {1} bookmarks defined. The free version of QuickFolders allows a maximum of {2}.

qf.notification.premium.shortcut.message: The premium license additionally gives you a configurable keyboard shortcut.

qf.notification.premium.tabIcons.message: You now use $cntIcons$ custom icons for Tabs. The unpaid version of QuickFolders supports a maximum of $maxFreeIcons$. The standard license supports $maxStdIcons$. QuickFolders Pro has no limit.

qf.notification.premium.text.message: {1} is a Premium feature, please get a QuickFolders Pro License for using it.

qf.notification.standard.readingList.message: You have now {1} bookmarks defined. The standard license of QuickFolders allows a maximum of {2}.

qf.notification.standard.text.message: {1} is a license restricted feature, please get a QuickFolders License for using it.

qf.pastefolders.tooltip.message: Delete all QuickFolders and read new configuration from clipboard

qf.pathFormat.tooltip.message: Maximum number of folders displayed in folder path.

qf.prompt.contact.subject.message: Please enter a short subject line:

qf.prompt.newFolder.newChildName.message: Enter name for new child folder under {0}

qf.prompt.pasteFolders.message:
This will delete all QuickFolders tabs and replace with the items in your clipboard.
{0} entries were found in clipboard.
Replace tabs?

qf.prompt.restoreFolders.message:
This will delete all QuickFolders tabs and replace with the items from the file.
{0} entries were read.
Replace tabs?

qf.quickMove.escapeClears.message: Escape Key always clears messages list.

qf.quickMove.excludeAccounts.message: Select any account that should be excluded from the search results:

qf.quickMove.lockAccount.message: Only show results from current mail account.

qf.textbox.searchBox.toolTip.message: enter a keyword to search filters by name

qf.themes.applePills.description.message: A pleasant layout for our Mac users - plain and simple; with some optional color perks.

qf.themes.flatButtons.description.message: Standard toolbar buttons - this is the closest you can get to the look of original version 0.5!

qf.themes.flatTabs.description.message: Modern tabbed look - fully customizable. Looks great on Windows and Linux.

qf.themes.nativeTabs.description.message: Layout resembles the tabs of your OS - less coloring options but may look more integrated and in sync with your Mail Client Themes.

qf.themes.realButtons.description.message: Pushbuttons - these look like standard buttons on dialog windows

qf.toolbarPosition.tooltip.message: 0 = on top of other toolbars; 100 = bottom. High value depends on other Add-ons.

qf.tooltip.conversationRead.message: Mark Conversation as Read and jump to next unread Email

qf.tooltip.emailIcon.message: Current Email - drag to a QuickFolders tab to move Mail

qf.tooltip.filterStart.message: Activate filter teaching. Dragging emails on a QuickFolder creates new Filters.

qf.tooltip.paintCanActive.message: Paint mode: click for palette, click tabs to color them, right-click tabs to extract their color

qf.tooltip.quickFoldersNavToggle.message: toggle navigating unread only / all mails

qf.tooltip.quickMove.message: Drag an email here then enter target folder name (quickMove); or click to jump into the folder (quickJump).

qf.tooltip.threadIcon.message: Current Thread - drag to a QuickFolders tab to move Conversation

qf.youtube.description.message: For detailed videos on Thunderbird Add-ons and how to use QuickFolders visit my YouTube channel Thunderbird Daily.

qf.youtube.tbdaily.message: Visit Thunderbird Daily - YouTube Channel for tips and tutorials for using QuickFolders

qfAlertDropFolderVirtual.message: You can not copy mail to a virtual folder!

qfAlertUpgradeSuccess.message: QuickFolders was successfully upgraded to version:

qfColorPickingWIP.message: Sorry, this feature is still Work in Progress!

qfInvalidTabCount.message: Found {0} Tabs that have an invalid folder destination. You can remove these using the 'Find orphaned Tabs' command.

qfMenuTabColorDisabledInTheme.message: Select different Theme to support coloring…

qfMoveFolderOrNewTab.message: Drag folders to an empty area of the toolbar - For MOVING a folder, hold down SHIFT and drag to a Tab.

qfNavigationWrapped.message: No other unread folders found, continuing in {1}.

qfNewName.message: Enter a new name for the tab

qfRepairTreeIconsMissing.message: The following icon files do not exist:

qfTabDeleteOption.message: Do this with the remaining {0} folders.

qfThisTabIsInvalid.message: : This is a tab that points to an invalid folder.

qfTidyDeadFolders.message:
This will remove the Tabs that have no valid folders assigned.
This sometimes happens if a folder is deleted or moved without QuickFolders being notified.

qfUpdatedThemesEngineMsg.message: A new theming engine for QuickFolders has been installed. Please select an item from the drop down box and click [Ok].

qfVersionDisableOnUpdate.message: Stop displaying version history after updates?

quickMove.help.l1a.message: Type the start of a folder name or words in it, delimited by space.

quickMove.help.l1b.message: The following characters are regarded as word boundaries and don't need to be typed:

quickMove.help.l2b.message: The first 2 letters of any parent are usually sufficient. You can also create new subfolders with this syntax.

quickMove.help.l3a.message: Type {1} for skipping any folders in between.

quickMove.help.l3b.message: This is useful for deeper, more complicated or unknown folder hierarchies.

quickMove.help.advanced.message: More advanced functions such as keyboard shortcuts to go to a folder / moving mail or excluding folders from search results can be configured on the QuickFolders Pro tab. To access these and other premium features, get a Pro license and support the future of QuickFolders.

quickMove.singleMessage.goNext.message: Display next mail after moving current one

quickMove.singleMessage.reopenTab.message: Reopen original mail after it was moved

quickfoldersQuickCopiedMails.message: Mail copied to folder {2};{1} mails copied to folder {2}

quickfoldersQuickMovedMails.message: Mail moved to folder {2};{1} mails moved to folder {2}

special-offer-content.message: Upgrade your features and save {boldStart}$reduction${boldEnd} by buying a {linkStartPro}QuickFolders Pro license{linkEnd}! This special offer will be available until {boldStart}$expirydate${boldEnd}. Or choose the standard functions with the new {linkStart}Standard License{linkEnd}.

special-offer-renew.message: Renew your License now and save {boldStart}$reduction${boldEnd}! This special offer will be available until {boldStart}$expirydate${boldEnd}.

special-offer-upgrade.message: Upgrade now from QuickFolders Standard to Pro and save {boldStart}$reduction${boldEnd}! This special offer will be available until {boldStart}$expirydate${boldEnd}.

special-offer-intro.message: {boldStart}Dear {name}{boldEnd}, please support $addon$ through getting a license. The Thunderbird code continuously evolves and we need {boldStart}your help{boldEnd} to keep up!

support-preference.message: This is the preferred way of supporting $addonName$.

support-suggestion.message: So that $addonName$ stays functional and alive, please do it a vital favor:

testDrive.message: The Standard License gives you some features that were previously flagged as premium and removes restrictions of the unfunded version. It finances the upkeep with the next Thunderbird version and conversion to a modern API based mail extension architecture.

time-and-effort.message: $addonName$ requires ongoing changes in order to remain compatible with the Mozilla platform. I am constantly working to retain as much functionality as possible for future versions of Thunderbird.

toAddress.tooltip.message: Default To Address when composing new mails

updatesExpiry.message: QuickFolders Pro will be automatically updated via addons.thunderbird.net as usual. After the year expires you can renew the license or keep using premium features under same terms as free users. 'Premium Exclusive' features will require a valid registration key.

whats-new-intro.message: Read the detailed change log here (English only):

whats-new-list.message: {L1}Thunderbird doesn't jump into Inbox anymore when checking for new mails from the context menu.{L2}{L1}Support for large icon in QuickFolders toolbar buttons for high resolution displays.{L2}{L1}Fixed: moving folders from the quickMove function failed in Tb91.{L2}{L1}Various Layout fixes specific to Thunderbird 91.{L2}

window-title.description: page title. first placeholder will be replaced with Add-on name

yearlyLicense.premiumFeatures.message: QuickFolders Pro gives you full unrestricted access to the premium features.

yearlyLicense.usageTerm.message: The license is for your personal use and is tied to your email address. You can install it on multiple email clients as long as they are configured to use that address.

yearlyLicense.usageTerm1.message: Any additional email addresses are no problem - they do not require a separate license. In case of questions you can reach me via the support tab.
